sentence: The image shows a mobile screenshot with two primary elements:
sentence_cn: 该图显示了包含两个主要元素的移动屏幕截图：

sentence: - At the top, there's a notification for an alarm labeled ¡°Office,¡± set for Thursday at 7:00 AM.
sentence_cn: - 在顶部，有一个名为“办公室”的闹钟通知，设置为周四早上 7:00。

sentence: - There are options to ¡°SNOOZE¡± or ¡°DISMISS¡± the alarm.
sentence_cn: - 可以选择“暂停”或“关闭”闹钟。

sentence: - Below the alarm notification is an ad for the "Kika Keyboard - Emojis, GIFs" app.
sentence_cn: - 闹钟通知下方是“Kika Keyboard - Emojis, GIFs”应用的广告。

sentence: - It displays an image of a phone with a colorful, glowing keyboard and a chat interface on the screen.
sentence_cn: - 它在屏幕上显示一部带有彩色发光键盘和聊天界面的手机图像。

sentence: - The text accompanying the ad states, ¡°Warning! This app can make your phone awesome!¡± with an ¡°INSTALL¡± button available.
sentence_cn: - 广告附带的文字指出，“警告！该应用可让您的手机变得更加棒！”，并带有“安装”按钮。

sentence: - At the bottom, it mentions ¡°Click to install CM Launcher to apply this theme,¡± along with a partially visible ¡°Install¡± button.
sentence_cn: - 在底部，提到“单击安装 CM Launcher 以应用此主题”，以及部分可见的“安装”按钮。

sentence: - There is a small label ¡°Ads by Cheetah Mobile¡± at the bottom left.
sentence_cn: - 左下角有一个小标签“猎豹移动广告”。

sentence: The screenshot depicts common mobile interface elements, blending alarm notifications and app advertisements.
sentence_cn: 屏幕截图展示了常见的移动界面元素，融合了警报通知和应用广告。
